title: Super spicy chickpea curry
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons sunflower oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1/2 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 large garlic clove, grated', '2 fresh green chilllies, sliced lenghthways', '3/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon extra hot chilli powder', '300g tinned or pre-cooked chickpeas', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander']
